skins.shipDescription: Farragut-class destroyer C Aylwin, Hull Number DD-355.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Aylwin, from the Eagle Union. During the war, I carried out many operations as well as training exercises, and had some ties with both the Royal Navy and Iris Libre. I admire elegant, mature women like Lexington. Commander, I look forward to working with you!
skins.acquisition: Greetings, my name is Aylwin. I'm actually quite talented at nautical navigation, so please allow me to be your guide.
skins.login: Commander, welcome back. It's the start of a bright new day!
skins.details: Commander, who do you like more - Lexington, or Saratoga? Or... perhaps some other girl has caught your eye?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I had a dream that I would one day share the stage with Lexington. If I could sing and dance just like her, which one of us would you support?
skins.secretaryIdle2: *pouts* Another training exercise? You keep saying next time... I want to sortie and go on real missions with everyone else!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Dewey really looks after me. Maybe she's also one of Lexington's fans, hehe~!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Jeez, Commander... That's a foul, you know?

skins.shipDescription: So this is an aquarium... What a novel experience! Oh, also, I won't be your guide today as it's your turn to escort me around, Commander. Please don't get us lost, okay? Ehehe~
skins.acquisition: So this is an aquarium... What a novel experience! Oh, also, I won't be your guide today as it's your turn to escort me around, Commander. Please don't get us lost, okay? Ehehe~
skins.login: How do you do, Commander? How's that? I learned how to curtsy from the Royal Navy maids~
skins.details: I'm feeling a little peckish... Umm, cookies, candy, and... Ah, I musn't... I have to leave enough for Commander...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even though I spent a lot of time training with the submarines, it's a totally different experience to enjoy the sight underwater.
skins.secretaryIdle2: This outfit was chosen painstakingly, you know? Commander, what do you think...?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Want to go see Lexington's performance together next time? I'll even get your ticket for you if you'd like.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, did you get some perverted ideas...?
